issue.title: mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.46.0 with the latest version of filter_14_Annoyances

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0105226/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The following lines from `filter_14_Annoyances` are disabling the rate button (1st line) and messing with the margin when clicking the rate button (2nd line).

imdb.com#$#div[data-testid="promptable"] { display: none !important; }
imdb.com#$?#body { overflow: auto !important; }

Can be tested on any movie page on IMDB.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This video is hidden because it does not match the content of the article and is an annoyance. To unblock it, please add these rules to the User Rules:
```
fastcompany.com#@#.sticky-inner-wrapper
fastcompany.com#@#.post__promotion
```

comment.body:
As far as I understand, it's caused by `Stealth mode` - `Protect from DPI`, so this rule:
```adblock
@@||bb.com.br^$stealth
```
should fixes it.

comment.body:
Now it worked, you can put this in the AdGuard filter?Enviado do meu Galaxy
-------- Mensagem original --------De : Adam ***@***.***> Data: 30/01/2023  08:47  (GMT-03:00) Para: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***> Cc: Eduardo Addad de Oliveira ***@***.***>, Mention ***@***.***> Assunto: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] www.bb.com.br (Issue #141091) 
As far as I understand, it's caused by Stealth mode - Protect from DPI, so this rule:
@@||bb.com.br^$stealth
should fixes it.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://mail.yandex.ru/?uid=870573386#inbox](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yandex.ru%2F%3Fuid%3D870573386%23inbox) ### Comment > Здравствуйте! Используя меню "Блокировать рекламу на этом сайте", скрываю 2 рекламных блока, отмеченных на скриншоте. Но ровно на следующий день реклама возвращается. Блокировал оба блока каждый день на протяжении нескольких месяцев, но что-то надоело этим заниматься и возник закономерный вопрос: почему такое происходит? Интересно с технической точки зрения. Предполагаю, что Яндекс таким образом борется с подобным ПО, но неужели вы не в силах блокировать вышеуказанную рекламу на постоянной основе? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/e0CGKDE.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.53 Browser: | Yandex Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
Обычная блокировка не поможет, поскольку Яндекс использует технологию повторной загрузки рекламы. Установите наш скрипт AdGuard Extra и затем очистите данные браузера.
Обратите внимание, что за Яндекс браузером было замечено ограничение доступа расширениям к своим сервисам и если способ ниже не поможет, то нужно либо поменять браузер, либо установить нашу программу.

---

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
The issue is caused by `Polish Social Filters`.
Please, add this rules to the User Rules:
```
wosp.org.pl#@#.fa-facebook-square
wosp.org.pl#@#.fa-twitter-square
wosp.org.pl#@#.fa-instagram
wosp.org.pl#@#.fa-facebook
wosp.org.pl#@#.fa-twitter.fa
wosp.org.pl#@#.fa-instagram
wosp.org.pl#@#.fa-youtube
```
or disable this filter.
